website_summaries.verdict: Many users have found themselves considering buying the Brooks Ghost 11 for a second or third time, while others were very expressive of their satisfaction as they switched from a different shoe – that’s how great they believe it is. With many praises about the shoe’s features and functionality, it is no surprise that wearers would regard the Ghost 11 as one of the best running shoes on the market.
pros: The Brooks Ghost 11 had a nice cushion that enabled an excellent transition with adequate bounce, according to an impressed user
Several wearers commended the shoe for its roomy interiors
The shoe is very accommodating towards heel strikers, some runners observed
The shoe’s minimal weight allowed for an effortless and comfortable run, a number of users commented
An athlete commended the Ghost 11 for being the most comfortable daily running shoe they have used
Another wearer said it gave the best arch support among other neutral running shoes
The shoe felt softer and more flexible compared to its previous versions, said a reviewer
The adequate cushioning of the midsole prevented foot pain and muscle stiffness, according to a wearer
One buyer compared wearing the shoe to “wrapping the foot in a cloud.”
The Brooks Ghost 11 is suitable for both walking and running, a user claimed
A consumer expressed that the Ghost 11 is highly recommendable to any runner with knee issues
cons: One reviewer attributed the shoe’s bulky and uncomfortable feel to its high heel-to-toe drop
The shoelaces are a bit short, a user supposed
The mesh upper does not look like a durable as it claims, a doubtful buyer stated

customer_reviews.title: Not for speed, more for long sessions. Comfortable. Size bigger than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Update04/03: ive used them for nursing in the hospital many hours standing/walking and the feet feels good after 12h shift. I'm still very happy with this ones. What I like : same comfort and size as my prev ones even they were diferent model Im a 43 eu in normal shoes but with this brand im a size bigger. This works for every model so when I asked for the new ghost it respected the rule. They feel exactly the same as my prev model but better, more comfort. Feels soft for longer time and doesnt weight much when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: anotherworld

customer_reviews.title: A well cushioned, comfortable, neutral running shoe perfect for those with arthritic knees!
customer_reviews.text: I have run for many, many years and due to this and a few old football injuries now have a few problems with my knees. I bought these after reading several favourable reviews re their cushioning and comfort. Fortunately for me, the reviews were accurate. I have now run about 40 miles in them and I can say they are easily the best running shoes I've had in years. They are well cushioned, comfortable with a smooth transition from heel to toe. I will certainly be buying another pair once these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Marion H.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner after a googling the best running shoes for 2018, these came out on top. He's really happy with them, he normally has sore feet after going for a run but he doesn't with these because they are well cushioned. Happy with the price as well but the price is dependent on size, I bought a mens 10 which fits perfectly, but I did find that just half a size up would have cost me an extra £50.
customer_reviews.author: Legless;-)

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and are easy to slide your feet into. They feel good when you are out running and don't rub any part of your foot so no blisters - I've run up to 17 kilometres at a time without issue. They are bouncy enough to give you a spring in your step but yet firm enough to give you good solid contact with the ground. They are also as light as a feather but still feel tough and robust. I've had them for about six weeks now and can recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: The Fury Zone

customer_reviews.title: What kind of magic is this?
customer_reviews.text: OK, I may be a nube when it comes to running shoes,but I have played basketball for over 20 years. Can't talk about durability or long term stuff because I have just got these 3 days ago, but these shoes ....make you want to walk more. OK, so this is my first pair of "performance" shoes and running is OK - nice and comfortable ( too many injuries to run super long distances ) , but walking is just ....... mindblowing. Just got my Mom a pair LOL So if you are like me. running some, but not a fanatic and you are wondering if buying more expensive shoes is worth it, give these a try. Sheesh. Well done Brooks!!!
customer_reviews.author: cherubino

customer_reviews.title: Well made, functional and comfortable running trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running trainers. I’m a fairly heavy footed runner and tend to get a few joint aches and pains. These trainers are lightweight but have good cushioning and support and do seem to reduce the stress on ankles, knees and hips. They fit really well, I’m a size 9 shoe and I got a 9.5 trainer and they fit perfectly. I run regularly but usually no more than 3 to 6 miles maximum each run, these running shoes are great for me over these distances. Probably fine for longer runs but you’d need to do your research. Well made, functional and a very comfortable running shoe, I’d definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The brooks ghost 11 running shoe has a comfortable feel over mid to long distances but still firm enough to feel responsive. The upper is both snug. yet comfortable enough around the ankle and top of the foot, but still plenty of toe room to prevent rubbing. The grip is sufficient but not suitable for of road or cobbles etc. Overall a great shoe, good feel and with a good life span. I would highly recommend this shoe to keen runners.

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Ghost 11 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The balanced cushioning helps to offer a smooth ride to the neutral runners looking for a versatile performance. With the new soft interior and a refined mesh upper, practically vanishes on the foot mainly thanks to the strategic position of stretch and Structure. Crash Pad segmented along the entire length of the foot that sustains the foot every time it touches the ground and offers soft transitions and the BioMoGo DNA and DNA Loft cushioning even more assure every step of the foot.
feature_bullets: BioMoGo DNA and DNA LOFT cushioning work together to provide a just-right softness underfoot without losing responsiveness and durability, yet feels lighter than ever.
No matter how your foot lands, our Segmented Crash Pad—an integrated system of shock absorbers—will cushion every step and stride for smooth heel-to-toe transitions.
By placing stretch and structure where you need it most, the newly engineered mesh upper practically disappears on your foot.
Omega Flex Grooves optimize forefoot flexibility.
The Gore-Tex version provides a waterproof, breathable upper.
